    • leaderChoice

      public static int[] leaderChoice​(int[] choices)
      method that takes the 4 leaders (form which the player chooses 2), prints them and asks for a selection, then returns the 2 selected values.
      Parameters:
      choices - vector that contains the 4 possible leaders
      Returns:
      vector containing the 2 selected leaders

    • selectANumber

      public static int selectANumber​(int min, int max, int mustBeDiverseFromThis)
      method that requests a int from the client and returns it after it passes some checkes
      Parameters:
      min - minimum value accepted
      max - maximum value accepted
      mustBeDiverseFromThis - optional value (set at -1 if not necessary), it's used if the number selected must be diverse from a specific number
      Returns:
      the slected and accepted value

      Parameters:
      status - gamestatus used to find informations quickly

    • storageSwapAction

      public static int[] storageSwapAction​(GameStatusUpdate status)
      method that prints the storage status and asks what depots should be swapped
      Parameters:
      status - game status used to print the storage
      Returns:
      vector containing the 2 selected levels+

    • printStorageEmptyStatus

      public static void printStorageEmptyStatus​(boolean[] emptyDepots, int[] resourceToManage)

    • resourceAdderInteraction

      public static void resourceAdderInteraction​(Storage storage, boolean[] resourcesStatus, int[] resources)
      manages the interaction with the storage when deciding where to place resources
      Parameters:
      storage - storage given to ease the interaction
      resourcesStatus - status created in the storage stating what resources are yet to be handled
      resources - resources left to place or discard

    • playOrDiscardLeader

      public static int[] playOrDiscardLeader​(GameStatusUpdate status, boolean isDiscarded1, boolean isDiscarded2)
      method used for the action play or discard a leader, prints a status of the leaders (prints the played leaders then the "playable or discardable" leaders) then asks for a selection
      Parameters:
      status - game status used to get faster the ids of the leaders
      isDiscarded1 - missing info in the game status is given directly
      isDiscarded2 - missing info in the game status is given directly
      Returns:
      selection

    • playOrDiscardActionResult

      public static void playOrDiscardActionResult​(int result)
      prints a result for the play or discard a leader action. has 5 possible results (one is the default, which is presented if an error occurs)
      Parameters:
      result - result is genereated as an int from the SinglePlayerHandler.playOrDiscardLeadersLogic method

    • printCardMarket

      public static void printCardMarket​(GameStatusUpdate status)
      prints all the cards visible in the market at the moment
      Parameters:
      status - gameStatus, contains the marketCards status

    • printCard

      public static void printCard​(int id)
      prints a specific card or EMPTY if the given id is zero
      Parameters:
      id - id of the card

    • selectACardFromMarket

      public static int selectACardFromMarket​(GameStatusUpdate status)
      method that handles the selection of a card during the buy a card from market.
      Parameters:
      status - game status used to print the market
      Returns:
      id of the bought card, 0 if action aborted

    • printLeaders

      public static void printLeaders​(GameStatusUpdate status, boolean[] onlyThese)
      prints leaders, can handle a boolean vector stating which leader should not be printed
      Parameters:
      status - game status to get the leaders id
      onlyThese - vector stating which leader should be printed (give null if both wanted)

      Parameters:
      status - game status to get the info for the print ( game.gameUpdate() )

    • validate

      public static boolean validate​(int num, int[][] matrix)
      checks if a card is in the market
      Parameters:
      num - card's id
      matrix - id of cardmarket
      Returns:
      true if id is in matrix, false otherwise

    • positionOfATrueValue

      public static int positionOfATrueValue​(int whatTrueAreYouSearching, boolean[] array)
      util that returns the position of a true inside vector (if i'm searching for the third true inside a {treu, true, false, false, false, true} the method will return 5
      Parameters:
      whatTrueAreYouSearching - number of true that must have appeared before the returned position
      array - array to scan
      Returns:
      position of the n-th true, -420 if the array contains less than n true

    • totalNumOfTrues

      public static int totalNumOfTrues​(boolean[] array)
      returns a number of trues in an array
      Parameters:
      array - array scanned
      Returns:
      number of true in the array
